column4: hello, someone may help me out. This is weird, i reiceve in email today under date of 6jan but when icheck in the header it said recieve from XXXXdomain on 14 february
does it mean that the guy who sent me the email did a date modification on the header?
Your smtp server had the message until you grabbed it I assume?
If this is a web client there was some fiddling, but if you haven't checked your mail in that long, then....
